com.superduckinvaders.game.entity

Class Particle

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.superduckinvaders.game.entity.Entity
      • com.superduckinvaders.game.entity.Particle

  • public class Particle
extends Entity
    Represents a particle effect using an Animation.

        y - the y coordinate
        duration - how long the particle effect should last for, in seconds
